EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify Rep when a new BOCA app has been submitted
EmailTemplate.name: BOCA Enterpise Email to Rep
EmailTemplate.subject: New Enterprise BOCA App has been Submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi!
A new {!Opportunity.Campaign_Program__c} online application has been submitted. Click on the link below to access the record.
{!Opportunity.Link}
Thanks
